translation.en: [narrator] This is a world like no other,
translation.ja: ここは他のどことも違う―

translation.en: one brimming with mystery and teeming with danger,
translation.ja: 多くの謎が渦巻く危険に満ちた世界

translation.en: filled with hundreds of islands strewn across vast seas.
translation.ja: 広大な海に無数に散らばる島々

translation.en: And throughout these seas are those who live according to their own rules,
translation.ja: その海に自分のルールで生きる者たちがいた

translation.en: who seek a life of freedom and adventure.
translation.ja: 自由と冒険を渇望する者たちだ

translation.en: This is a world of pirates!
translation.ja: そう ここは海賊の世界

translation.en: [man] Piracy is a scourge upon this world.
translation.ja: 海賊はこの世の害悪だ

translation.en: For too long, villains and miscreants have sown havoc across our seas.
translation.ja: 長い間 悪党どもが我々の海を荒らしてきた 長い間 悪党どもが我々の海を荒らしてきたローグタウン　22年前 ローグタウン　22年前

translation.en: But the Marines, on behalf of your World Government,
translation.ja: ローグタウン　22年前だが海軍は世界政府の名のもとに だが海軍は世界政府の名のもとに

translation.en: strive to keep you safe and protected.
translation.ja: 人々の安全を守るべく尽力してきた

translation.en: And today we've made a great stride in that effort.
translation.ja: 今日― その努力が大きく実を結んだ

translation.en: Gold Roger,
the so-called King of the Pirates,
translation.ja: 〝ゴールド･ロジャー〞 〝ゴールド･ロジャー〞通称〝海賊王〞がついに捕らえられた

translation.en: has been captured.
translation.ja: 通称〝海賊王〞がついに捕らえられた

translation.en: His reign of terror ends this day.
translation.ja: 恐怖の支配はこれで終わる

translation.en: Peace shall be restored.
translation.ja: 平和が取り戻されるだろう

translation.en: Let this be a message to break the spirit of anyone foolish enough
translation.ja: そして彼に続こうとする愚か者たちの士気も

translation.en: to follow in his footsteps.
Gold Roger,
you have been sentenced to death
for the crimes of piracy,
thievery,
and conspiracy against the World Government.
translation.ja: 世界政府に対する謀略だ

translation.en: -Do you have any last words? -Yeah.
translation.ja: 言い残すことは？ ああ

translation.en: Would you take these off? Starting to itch.
translation.ja: こいつを外したいかゆいんだ

translation.en: I warned you.
You brought this upon yourself.
That I did, Vice-Admiral.
Now I'm bringing it to one and all.
translation.ja: だがおれの意志は死なない

translation.en: [man] By the authority of the World Government…
translation.ja: 世界政府の権限により

translation.en: I declare your life
forfeit--
[man 2] Pirate King, where is your treasure?
translation.ja: おい 海賊王！ あんたの財宝は？

translation.en: -[man 3] Tell us where you hid it! -[crowd clamoring]
You want to know where my treasure is?
translation.ja: おれの財宝が欲しけりゃ―

translation.en: I'll tell you.
Wealth.
Fame.
Power.
I found everything this world has to offer.
translation.ja: この世のすべてをそこに置いてきた

translation.en: Free yourselves.
Take to the seas!
My treasure is yours to find.
translation.ja: おれの財宝を探し出せ

translation.en: [narrator] Gold Roger's final words changed the world forever.
translation.ja: ゴールド･ロジャーが死に際に放った一言は

translation.en: A new age was born,
translation.ja: 人々を海へと駆り立てた

translation.en: the Great Pirate Era,
setting off a race across the seas to find the Pirate King's hidden treasure,
translation.ja: 大海原を駆けめぐり 目指すは海賊王の残した宝

translation.en: the One Piece.
translation.ja: ひとつなぎの大秘宝(ワンピース)

translation.en: [man] Ever since I was a kid,
translation.ja: シャンクスはいつも シャンクスはいつも東の海(イーストブルー)　現在 東の海(イーストブルー)　現在

translation.en: Shanks would tell me stories about pirates and their adventures.
translation.ja: 東の海(イーストブルー)　現在海賊と冒険の話を聞かせてくれた 海賊と冒険の話を聞かせてくれた

translation.en: So, yeah, the sea's been calling.
translation.ja: そう 海が呼んでるんだ

translation.en: Well, not exactly calling, because I pretty much can't swim,
translation.ja: まあ― そうは言っても泳げねェんだけど

translation.en: but you get the idea.
I'm setting out to follow my dream,
translation.ja: でっけェ夢を追いかけるんだ

translation.en: to find the One Piece
translation.ja: ワンピースを見つけて

translation.en: and become King of the Pirates!
All I need is a loyal crew.
I think about ten men should do.
Well, ten men and a bird.
It's not gonna be easy. The ocean is… is pretty big and kind of dangerous.
translation.ja: 楽じゃねェよ海は広いし危険だらけだ

translation.en: So what do you say?
Are you with me?
Mutiny.
Oh man.
It's my first day.
[man] Load your cannons!
Fire!
[woman] Take everything!
But leave the crew to me.
Let's show 'em what true terror looks like.
translation.ja: 本当の恐怖を見せてやる

translation.en: Where is the pirate hunter Roronoa Zoro?
translation.ja: 海賊狩りのロロノア･ゾロは？

translation.en: Don't deny he was on your ship.
translation.ja: お前の船にいたはずだ

translation.en: He booked passage to Sixis Island. After that, I don't know.
translation.ja: シクシス島まで乗せたその後は知らない

translation.en: Liar! I know Zoro must be after me. Who else is worthy of his pursuit?
translation.ja: ウソだ ロロノアが追うべき相手はこの私だ

translation.en: He had a list of pirates and their bounties.
translation.ja: 彼は賞金首のリストを持ってた

translation.en: And of course, I was at the top.
Actually, your name wasn't on it.
translation.ja: あんたの名はなかった

translation.en: -Koby, clean up this mess. -Coming, Captain Alvida!
translation.ja: コビー 後始末だ はい アルビダ様

translation.en: [Alvida] Who's the most powerful pirate on the seas?
translation.ja: この海で最強の海賊は誰だ？

translation.en: -[pirates yelling] Alvida! -Captain Alvida!
Who's there?
Hey!
Knock it off!
Please don't kill me.
-Hey. -Please.
translation.ja: おい 落ち着けって

translation.en: Hey, hey, hey. I'm not gonna kill you, all right?
translation.ja: おい 落ち着けって 殺したりしねェよ

translation.en: I just need you to be quiet.
translation.ja: ただ少し静かにしててくれ

translation.en: First things first.
-Do you have any food here? -[Koby] What?
translation.ja: 食いもんは？ 何です？

translation.en: I'm starving.
Alvida doesn't let me eat until after she finishes her meal.
translation.ja: アルビダ様が許しません

translation.en: -Who's Alvida? -This is her ship.
translation.ja: アルビダ？ この船の主です

translation.en: -She's captain of the Alvida Pirates. -Oh, that's great!
translation.ja: アルビダ海賊団の船長 そりゃいい

translation.en: -It is? -[man] Yeah!
'Cause I'm a pirate too.
translation.ja: ああ おれも海賊だ

translation.en: [Koby] You don't look like a pirate.
-What do they look like? -Pirates are scum.
translation.ja: 見えねェか？ 海賊というのは―

translation.en: They're thieves and murderers.
Not the pirates I know.
Shanks. He's back!
Work fast as the breeze, men!
Captain wants this haul to the traders by nightfall.
translation.ja: 日没までに引き渡すぞ

translation.en: Before those Marine bastards get back on our trail.
translation.ja: 海軍どもが気づく前にな

translation.en: Easy with this, Roux. It's worth more than the rest of the loot put together.
translation.ja: 気をつけろ ルウこいつの価値分かってるか？

translation.en: [Roux] Aye, captain.
Pretend it's a leg of lamb. You wouldn't drop that.
translation.ja: 極上のラム肉と思え落とせんだろ

translation.en: -Here. -[pirate] Got it, Captain.
Luffy! I was wondering when you'd pop up.
Our favorite street urchin comes to welcome us back. [grunts]
translation.ja: かわいい悪ガキがお出迎えだ

translation.en: How ya been, kid?
I'm not an urchin. I'm a pirate!
translation.ja: 悪ガキじゃない　海賊だ

translation.en: I'm not joking. I'm ready to join your crew.
translation.ja: 本気だよいつでも仲間になる

translation.en: The sea isn't a child's game.
It's dangerous. The scars on my face are proof of that.
translation.ja: 危険なんだ この顔の傷を見ろ

translation.en: I can do it, Shanks. I swear.
translation.ja: おれだってできる 絶対に

translation.en: You're not ready.
I am. And I'll show you!
translation.ja: できるさ　証拠見せてやる

translation.en: Might want to take it easy on him, Captain.
He's got no family to speak of. The kid's on his own.
Better a disappointed kid now than a dead one later.
translation.ja: 下手におだてて死なせるよりいい

translation.en: Let's get this done. [grunts]
-These men need a drink. -[man] Aye, Captain.
-And a bath. -Hey, Shanks!
translation.ja: 風呂もな シャンクス！

translation.en: [Shanks] Put it down, Luffy. Before you hurt yourself.
translation.ja: やめときな　ケガするぞ

translation.en: I'm not afraid of getting hurt. And I'll prove it to you.
translation.ja: ケガは怖くない 見せてやる

translation.en: Luffy!
[Koby] I don't get it. Why would anyone want to be a pirate?
translation.ja: 海賊になりたいなんて理解できません

translation.en: 'Cause it's the best thing there is.
You have the… the wind in your back, the salty sea air,
translation.ja: 背中に風を受け海の匂いを吸い込む

translation.en: your loyal crew by your side.
You never know what's on the horizon.
It's all about being… free.
translation.ja: そのすべてが 自由だ

translation.en: Nothing's free about Alvida's crew.
translation.ja: ここに自由などありません

translation.en: She tells me when to eat, when to sleep.
translation.ja: 食事も睡眠も指図されて

translation.en: I even have to paint her toenails.
translation.ja: 足の爪まで塗らされる

translation.en: -So why don't you just leave? -No one leaves Alvida!
translation.ja: やめれば？ ここから逃げるなんて

translation.en: She'll never let me go.
You should never let anyone tell you what you can't do.
translation.ja: 無理なことなんてねェよ

translation.en: If I did that,
I never would've left my village to go find the One Piece.
translation.ja: 大秘宝(ワンピース)を見つけるためだ！

translation.en: Gold Roger's treasure?
That's impossible. Every pirate in the world is after that.
translation.ja: 無理ですよ世界中の海賊が狙ってる

translation.en: Why shouldn't I be the one to find it?
translation.ja: おれが見つけてもいいだろ

translation.en: As soon as I'm out of here, I'm on my way to the Grand Line.
translation.ja: ここを出たら偉大なる航路(グランドライン)に入る

translation.en: Pirate graveyard.
There are a-hundred-foot waves and sea beasts that'll crush your bones.
translation.ja: 30メートルの大波や海獣が襲う場所です

translation.en: Once you enter the Grand Line, you never return.
translation.ja: 入ったら最後 戻れません

translation.en: It sounds kind of fun.
Wait!
Is… is that… is that one of the sea beasts?
[Koby] It's just Alvida snoring.
If you want to get out of here, it's now or never.
Lifeboats are tied at the stern of the ship.
-Gonna need one of these. -[Koby] Head due north.
translation.ja: これも要る 北へ行けば数日で陸地に

translation.en: -You should hit land in a few days. -North.
translation.ja: 北へ行けば数日で陸地に 北？　北ってどっちだ？

translation.en: Which way is north?
translation.ja: 北？　北ってどっちだ？

translation.en: [Alvida] What the hell is going on up there?
translation.ja: そこで一体何をしてるんだ？

translation.en: -What's the meaning of this? -Alvida, I can explain.
translation.ja: これは何だ？ 今 説明を…

translation.en: You dare betray me to a bounty hunter?
translation.ja: アタシを賞金稼ぎに売る気かい？

translation.en: No, that's not it at all.
And you, you're too scrawny to be Roronoa Zoro.
translation.ja: ロロノア･ゾロにしちゃ貧相だね

translation.en: I'm Monkey D. Luffy.
Never heard of you.
Well, remember the name, 'cause I'm gonna be King of the Pirates.
translation.ja: 覚えとくといい 海賊王になる男だ

translation.en: You must be new around here, boy,
translation.ja: 何も分かっちゃいないね

translation.en: because who is the most powerful pirate on the seas?
translation.ja: なぜならこの海で最強の海賊は…？

translation.en: -[pirates] Captain Alvida! -Captain Alvida!
translation.ja: アルビダ様です アルビダ様！

translation.en: I'm sorry. I didn't hear you, Koby.
translation.ja: コビー 聞こえなかったよ

translation.en: Who's the most powerful pirate on the seas?
translation.ja: この海で最強の海賊は？

translation.en: -Answer me, you sniveling runt. -He doesn't have to.
translation.ja: 答えな 泣き虫坊主 必要ねェ

translation.en: Koby's his own man.
-Shut up. -[Alvida] No. No, he's not.
He's mine, and he'll always be mine.
translation.ja: こいつは私のものだずっとね

translation.en: That's not what he told me.
He said that you were mean. -[chuckles] -[Luffy] And cruel.
translation.ja: お前がイカついクソババアだって

translation.en: And that you're as dumb as a sea cow.
No, Captain Alvida! I didn't!
What kind of a monster are you?
The stretchy kind.
You! This is all your fault!
translation.ja: 何もかも お前のせいだよ！

translation.en: That's enough.
Gum Gum…
Pistol!
Anyone else got a problem with Koby?
Come on.
We're gonna need a boat and enough food for a few days.
translation.ja: 船と２人分の食料が要るな

translation.en: -Me? -Yeah!
You're coming with me, right?
[man] You can come out.
[man 2] People often visit shrines to light candles for those they've lost.
translation.ja: 人は霊場を訪れ火を灯し 亡き者をしのぶ

translation.en: Who are yours for?
This one is for someone I knew a long time ago.
translation.ja: これは遠い昔の知人を

translation.en: [man 2] And the other?
[man] You've been following me for three days.
-What do you want? -[man 2] You may call me Mr. 7.
translation.ja: 何の用だ？ Mr.７(ミスターセブン)と呼んでくれ

translation.en: I represent an organization known as Baroque Works.
translation.ja: バロックワークスという組織の者だ

translation.en: We are interested in your unique set of skills,
translation.ja: お前の類まれなその腕に興味がある

translation.en: pirate hunter Roronoa Zoro.
translation.ja: 海賊狩りのロロノア･ゾロ

translation.en: What are you? Some band of assassins?
translation.ja: お前らは？ 暗殺集団か？

translation.en: We are much, much more.
translation.ja: そんな単純なものではない

translation.en: You should know it's a high honor to be asked to join our ranks.
translation.ja: 勧誘されるのは名誉だと思え

translation.en: Kind of got my own thing going on.
Membership would make you even more invincible, more feared.
translation.ja: 仲間になれば今以上に 誰もが恐れる

translation.en: Does it come with a free face tattoo?
translation.ja: 顔の入れ墨もセットか？

translation.en: My favorite is Number 1.
To turn down Baroque Works is to forfeit your life.
translation.ja: Ｂ･Ｗ(バロックワークス)を拒否することは死を意味する

translation.en: [Zoro] If they were that serious, they should've sent someone better than Number 7.
translation.ja: 本気なら７番手よりマシなやつをよこせよ

translation.en: [Koby] That look on Alvida's face.
I've never seen anyone stand up to her before.
-[Luffy] Shouldn't have messed with you. -How did you stretch like that?
translation.ja: 自業自得だ なぜそんな体に？

translation.en: It's kind of a long story.
[Shanks] At least you didn't get your eye.
I was aiming for it, but I missed.
translation.ja: 狙ったけど外れたんだ

translation.en: Ow.
-I thought you said you were tough. -I am!
translation.ja: 強いんだろ 強いさ

translation.en: Don't stitch it too good. I want everyone to see my scar.
translation.ja: きれいに縫うなよ傷痕を見せたい

translation.en: Scars don't make the man, Luffy.
translation.ja: 男の勲章は傷じゃない

translation.en: It's the lesson behind the scar, and you didn't earn this one.
translation.ja: 傷に隠れた経験だ お前にはない

translation.en: Then let me earn it. I'll be the best pirate ever.
translation.ja: じゃあ経験積ませてよ 最強の海賊になる

translation.en: Look, I've been practicing what my face is gonna look like on my wanted poster.
translation.ja: 見て 手配書に載る顔の練習もしてる

translation.en: I've no doubt your mug will be on a wanted poster one day.
translation.ja: お前はいつか手配書に載るだろう

translation.en: But you're not ready.
My ship already has an anchor.
I'm not an anchor.
translation.ja: 錨は間に合ってる おれは錨じゃない

translation.en: Stupid Shanks.
[grunts] Stupid treasure.
[man] There you go, Captain.
Bring us your best whiskey.
I'm afraid we're out.
That'd be our fault, friend. We've, uh, been doing some celebrating.
translation.ja: すまねェな おれたちが店の酒を飲み尽くしちまった

translation.en: We've drunk the place dry, but…
translation.ja: おれたちが店の酒を飲み尽くしちまった

translation.en: perhaps this will make up for it.
What can we do with one bottle?
Generally, you drink it.
Now there's glass everywhere.
Makino, got a mop?
translation.ja: マキノさん モップを

translation.en: Since you like cleaning so much.
Come on, men.
Let's find a real bar.
-He got you good, huh, Cap'n? -[man 2] "You got a mop?"
Why are you laughing?
How could you let him insult you like that?
All he did was spill a drink on me.
But you should've fought back! Why didn't you kick his ass?
translation.ja: 何で反撃しない？負かしてやれよ

translation.en: Not everything can be solved with violence.
translation.ja: 暴力がすべてじゃない

translation.en: A man needs to be strong, but he also needs to be good.
translation.ja: 力は必要だが優しくもなきゃ

translation.en: You're not a real man.
You're nothing but a coward.
You see?
I told you, you weren't ready.
-[groans] -[Shanks] Wait.
-Luffy! -[grunting]
What have you done?
[Koby] You ate a Devil Fruit?
I didn't know any better.
But mine was a Gum Gum Fruit. It turned my body into rubber.
translation.ja: “ゴムゴムの実”だ で 体がゴムに

translation.en: [Luffy] Huh?
So now what?
-We have to be going somewhere, right? -[Luffy] We are going somewhere.
translation.ja: 行き先がなくちゃ どこかは行くさ

translation.en: Next stop,
to the Grand Line!
translation.ja: 偉大なる航路(グランドライン)

translation.en: Do you know how to get there?
You can't navigate. You don't even have a map!
translation.ja: 航海術も海図もないんでしょ？

translation.en: Good point.
We should probably pick one up.
Maybe I've made a mistake. I never should've left Alvida.
translation.ja: 間違ってたかも ぼくは来るべきじゃ…

translation.en: Koby, if you could do anything in the world right now,
translation.ja: コビー もしも何でもできるとしたら

translation.en: what would it be?
I guess there is one thing, but…
it's dumb.
-What was that for? -You being dumb.
translation.ja: 何で？ バカはお前だ

translation.en: Now spit it out.
I've kind of…
I've always wanted to be…
a Marine.
Ever since I was a kid,
I wanted to protect people that can't protect themselves.
translation.ja: 弱い人を守りたいとずっと思ってた

translation.en: I told you it was dumb.
If that's what you want,
I think you should do it.
I'll help you out.
You don't even know me.
We shared a meal, Koby.
And if being a Marine is your dream…
translation.ja: そして お前の夢は海軍

translation.en: that's good enough for me.
Okay.
So you plot a course to the next Marine base.
translation.ja: ここから一番近い海軍基地に向かうぞ

translation.en: I get my map,
and you can join up. Yeah.
translation.ja: お前は入隊 そんじゃ

translation.en: All right. Well, I'm gonna take that nap now.
translation.ja: おれは昼寝でもするとするか

translation.en: You can't just waltz into a Marine base and ask for a map to the Grand Line!
translation.ja: そんな普通に行っても海図は手に入りませんよ

translation.en: Don't worry.
I'm stealthy.
Yeah. Super stealthy.
[man] There's someone in there. Let's get closer.
translation.ja: 人がいるぞ　もっと近づけ

translation.en: Help me!
Water…
Oh, you're in luck, sweetheart. We're all the help you'll need.
translation.ja: 運がいいな 娘さん 助けるぜ

translation.en: My crew was attacked by pirates.
translation.ja: 仲間はみんな海賊にやられて

translation.en: I… I barely managed to make it out alive.
translation.ja: 仲間はみんな海賊にやられて やっと逃げてきたんです

translation.en: [man] Pirates, you say?
I hear they're a terrible lot.
[man 2] The worst sort. Good thing we found you instead of them.
translation.ja: 通ったのがおれたちでよかった

translation.en: What you got there? Something to share?
translation.ja: そこにあるのは？ お宝か？

translation.en: No. Please, no, it's… it's all I have. Please.
translation.ja: ダメ… お願いです　これだけは どうか…

translation.en: It's a fair trade for saving your life. [grunts]
Hey, what gives?
Sorry, boys. Thanks for the rescue.
translation.ja: ごめんね 救助ありがと

translation.en: [Luffy] I didn't know there were so many pirates!
There are way worse pirates on the Grand Line.
It's terrible.
Yeah.
Yeah. I know, right?
Where's my face?
Well, only one way I'm gonna get inside that base.
translation.ja: さて 基地に入る方法は―

translation.en: And it's not on an empty stomach.
translation.ja: まず腹ごしらえすることだ

translation.en: Come on.
We already have our food.
No, more is better. More is better. You gotta feed the brain.
translation.ja: 多いほどいい　脳にも必要だ

translation.en: All right, so…
I can't get inside the base through the gate,
translation.ja: 門から入るのは無理だろ

translation.en: but maybe… maybe… maybe what if I get inside flying?
translation.ja: そうだ こうしよう 空から入るんだ

translation.en: I can grab onto a bird or something.
translation.ja: 鳥か何かにつかまってよ

translation.en: That's a terrible idea.
Keep your voice down.
A bottle for me, and one for my friend.
translation.ja: ビール　連れの分も

translation.en: He's had a rough day.
Hi.
Can I buy you a drink?
Too tall.
You like rum?
Yeah, sure. As much as the next guy.
translation.ja: ああ好きだ　さっきの彼も…

translation.en: I'm not asking the next guy.
-What's this? -Rice balls. For you.
translation.ja: これは？ おにぎり　お兄ちゃんに

translation.en: -You made them yourself? -Mm-hmm.
-What's the brown stuff? -Chocolate. Makes everything taste better.
translation.ja: 茶色いのは？ チョコ　おいしいと思って

translation.en: [woman] Rika?
You stupid, stupid girl.
translation.ja: おい何しやがる　このガキ

translation.en: -Why don't you watch where you're going? -[woman] Rika, apologize to our guest.
translation.ja: 気をつけろよ リカ 謝りなさい

translation.en: I'm… I'm so sorry.
translation.ja: あの… ご… ごめんなさい

translation.en: [mockingly] "I'm so sorry!"
Next time, I won't be so nice.
[Zoro] You dropped my food.
Mmm.
Delicious.
Now you eat one.
And apologize to the girl.
Do you know who I am?
A shithead Marine with a bad haircut.
translation.ja: だせェ髪型の海兵様に

translation.en: I wouldn't do that.
Oh, come on, tough guy. Three swords? [laughs]
translation.ja: 刀３本とは勇ましいことで

translation.en: I only need one.
Okay.
-But it's gonna hurt. -[grunts]
[Luffy] Wow.
Good fighter.
You shouldn't draw your blade unless you're prepared to use it.
translation.ja: 覚悟もないのに刀を抜くなよ

translation.en: Don't kill me, please. My father will give you anything you want.
translation.ja: 殺さないで この償いはおやじが

translation.en: Who's your father?
Captain Morgan. He's in charge of the Marine base.
translation.ja: モーガン大佐この基地のトップだ

translation.en: Then he owes me money.
I understand you sent four of my Marines to the infirmary.
translation.ja: 海兵４人を医務室送りにしたそうだな

translation.en: Without drawing a blade, I might add.
translation.ja: それも刀を抜きもせず

translation.en: Impressive.
I didn't want to make a mess.
[Morgan] Roronoa Zoro. The Demon.
translation.ja: ロロノア･ゾロ　まさに魔獣

translation.en: Most feared pirate hunter in the East Blue.
translation.ja: 東の海(イーストブルー)最恐の海賊狩り

translation.en: Hmm. I'd say you live up to your reputation.
If it's all the same, I'll just take my money and go.
translation.ja: さっさと用を済ませたい

translation.en: [Morgan] You'll collect your bounty,
but the penalty for assaulting a Marine is seven days strung up in the yard.
translation.ja: だが海兵暴行の罪で７日間 はりつけの刑だ

translation.en: No food or water.
You can try to arrest me, but your brat'll be the first one I kill.
translation.ja: 捕まえてみろ 真っ先にバカ息子が死ぬぞ

translation.en: Hey! He can't speak to me that way!
translation.ja: こいつおれをバカ息子って！

translation.en: I like you.
Oh, we should be working for the same team.
translation.ja: どうだ？ おれの下で働かないか？

translation.en: You'd make a hell of a Marine.
Kind of got my own thing going on.
Doesn't leave much time for playing dress-up.
translation.ja: 軍隊ごっこにも興味はねェ

translation.en: It's a shame to lose a man of your talents,
translation.ja: その才能を逃すのは残念だ

translation.en: since you won't be able to collect a bounty at any Marine base once I get the word out.
translation.ja: 二度と海軍からの懸賞金は手にできまい

translation.en: So what's it gonna be?
translation.ja: さあ どちらを選ぶ？

translation.en: A new career? [chuckles]
Or the yard?
Seven days?
I could catch up on my sleep.
[Koby] I can't stop thinking about that fight.
That guy was amazing.
And what's with the third sword?
I mean, where does it even go?
translation.ja: あれって― どう使うんだ？

translation.en: No.
He had to protect that little girl from the Marines,
translation.ja: あの人は海軍から女の子を守ってた

translation.en: who were supposed to be protecting her.
It doesn't make any sense.
If there are good pirates and bad pirates, then
translation.ja: いい海賊と悪い海賊がいるように

translation.en: there are gonna be good Marines and bad Marines too.
translation.ja: 悪い海軍もいるんだろ

translation.en: You'll be one of the good ones.
[Koby] Maybe Alvida was right.
I don't know anything about the world.
But you were her prisoner.
Yeah, but I knew who I was.
translation.ja: でも なすべきことは分かってた

translation.en: Now I have no idea.
Hey, Koby.
Koby!
I need to get into the base and find that map,
translation.ja: おれは基地に入って海図を探す

translation.en: and I could use some help.
You want me to help you steal from the Marines?
No. Of course not.
How about you help me
get the boat ready?
You can handle that, right?
I guess so.
What are you gonna do?
I'm working on that.
Beautiful morning, isn't it?
A bit hot for my taste though.
translation.ja: おれにはちょい暑すぎるが

translation.en: The great Demon.
More like a misbehaving puppy tied up in the backyard.
translation.ja: 今は庭につながれた子犬だな

translation.en: What do you say, puppy? Do you want to do a trick for me?
translation.ja: やあ 子犬ちゃん 芸でも見せてくれ

translation.en: Sit up and beg.
Put it down!
What's so special about this old thing? Hmm?
translation.ja: このボロい刀がそんなに大事か？

translation.en: Enjoy these seven days,
'cause when I get down from here, you'll be the one begging.
translation.ja: 解放されたら命乞いさせてやる

translation.en: When you get down?
You think my father's gonna let you go? [scoffs]
You are going to die in this yard.
translation.ja: お前はここでこのまま死ぬんだよ

translation.en: Hut. Hut. Hut. Hut. Hut. Hut!
Oh, hey. You're the guy from the bar.
translation.ja: やあ 酒場にいたな

translation.en: -Get lost. -I am lost.
translation.ja: 失せやがれ そうしたいけど 迷った

translation.en: I'm trying to get inside the base.
Hey, I saw the way you fight. How did they even arrest you?
translation.ja: お前 強いのにやつらに捕まったのか？

translation.en: They didn't.
I gave myself up.
Interesting choice.
I'm sure you had your reasons.
You don't know anything about me.
I know that you protected that little girl from those Marines last night.
translation.ja: 昨日 店のチビを守ってたな

translation.en: You're a good guy.
I'm Roronoa Zoro, the pirate hunter.
translation.ja: おれはロロノア･ゾロ 海賊狩りだ

translation.en: Well, I'm Monkey D. Luffy,
translation.ja: おれはモンキー･Ｄ･ルフィ

translation.en: and I will be the King of the Pirates.
And I think you should join my crew.
translation.ja: おれの仲間になってくれ

translation.en: What makes you think I'd wanna play pirates with you?
translation.ja: 何でおれがお前なんかと？

translation.en: You're a great fighter.
I'd say that together, we'd make a pretty good team.
I kill your kind for a living.
Pirate… hunter.
translation.ja: お前らを― 狩るんだ

translation.en: You keep saying that,
but is that all you are?
Is that all you want?
I made a promise to someone a long time ago…
translation.ja: ずっと昔 親友と約束した

translation.en: to become the world's greatest swordsman.
translation.ja: 世界一の大剣豪になると

translation.en: Impressive.
You can untie me, but I'm still not gonna join your crew.
Okay.
[Zoro] I mean it. I don't owe you anything.
translation.ja: 恩を売る気なら無駄だ

translation.en: I just think it's a waste of time for you to be hanging out here
translation.ja: こうしてる時間がもったいないだろ

translation.en: when there's something you want out there.
Good luck on the sword thing.
Hey, can you close this behind me?
translation.ja: なあ ここ閉めといてくれ

translation.en: Thanks!
[woman] Hey!
You're not supposed to be in here.
Captain Morgan sent me to find a map of The Grand Line ahead of his security briefing this afternoon.
translation.ja: モーガン大佐の指示で偉大なる航路(グランドライン)の海図を

translation.en: Why would he do that? All maps pertaining to The Grand Line
translation.ja: それは変ね 海図は大佐の執務室に保管されてる

translation.en: are kept under lock and key in his private office.
translation.ja: 海図は大佐の執務室に保管されてる

translation.en: I'm just following orders. But if you want to question Axe-Hand Morgan, be my guest.
translation.ja: 命令に従っただけなので私に聞かれても

translation.en: Hey, we don't have any maps to The Grand Line down here, do we?
translation.ja: ねえ 偉大なる航路(グランドライン)の海図って…

translation.en: Nah, we didn't get any.
Hey, you're that girl from the bar.
translation.ja: お前 酒場にいた女だな

translation.en: The one who stole my uniform.
This is fine.
No problem.
Whoa! Hey, hey, hey! No, don't do that.
translation.ja: おい待て　やめとけって

translation.en: I'm taking you into custody for trespassing on a Marine base.
translation.ja: 基地への不法侵入で拘束する

translation.en: Better take yourself into custody too, 'cause you're not a Marine.
translation.ja: 自分だって海兵じゃないだろ

translation.en: Am too.
[Luffy] No, you're not. I heard everything.
translation.ja: いや お前は違う全部聞いてたぞ

translation.en: You stole that guy's uniform. And now you're looking for my map.
translation.ja: 軍服を盗んだことも おれの海図のことも

translation.en: Your map?
Yep. My map to The Grand Line.
translation.ja: 偉大なる航路(グランドライン)のね

translation.en: It's my map, and I'm not leaving here without it.
Suit yourself.
Hey! Hey! Get back here!
translation.ja: ちょっと　待ちなさいよ

translation.en: Do you have any idea what you're doing?
Looking for that Morgan guy's office. Map's there, right?
translation.ja: モーガンってやつの部屋にあるんだろ

translation.en: That's your plan? Just walk into Axe-Hand Morgan's office and ask him for the map?
translation.ja: “斧手(おのて)のモーガン”に海図をくれとでも言うの？

translation.en: I may have to fight him for it. Why do they call him Axe-Hand anyways?
translation.ja: ダメなら力ずくで奪う でも“斧手”って？

translation.en: You are going to get us both caught if you keep stomping around this place.
translation.ja: ドカドカ歩いてたら２人とも捕まる

translation.en: We need a plan.
Axe-Hand!
Are you going to kill me?
Oh no.
I've got something much worse in mind.
translation.ja: もっとひどい目に遭わせる

translation.en: Captain Morgan, sir, I was just escorting this prisoner to the brig.
translation.ja: この囚人を連行するところです

translation.en: He was arrested for causing a disturbance in the square.
translation.ja: 迷惑行為で逮捕しました

translation.en: [Luffy] Yeah. Prisoner.
translation.ja: そう おれは囚人だ

translation.en: I've never seen you before.
I'm a transfer from the 77th, sir.
What's your name, Private?
Nami, sir.
I put in a request to serve under your command.
translation.ja: 大佐に仕えたく移籍を申し出ました

translation.en: Wise choice.
I expect great things from you.
Yeah. She's the best!
translation.ja: ああ こいつは最高さ

translation.en: I… I mean, she's the best of the worst.
translation.ja: いや つまり最高に最悪ってことで

translation.en: I hate the Marines.
Carry on.
That was amazing. Admit it. We do make a pretty good team.
translation.ja: おれたちいい仲間になれるな

translation.en: We are not a team.
Whatever you say.
Now all we have to do is figure out a way to get into Axe-Man's office.
translation.ja: 問題はどうやって部屋に入るかだ

translation.en: Are those his keys?
How'd you do that?
I'm a thief.
You know, you're really good at thieving… and a good talker too.
translation.ja: お前は盗みもうまいし口もよく回る

translation.en: You should think about joining my pirate crew.
translation.ja: 一緒に海賊やらねェか？

translation.en: Let's get one thing straight. I am never joining anything with you.
translation.ja: 言っておく あんたの仲間にはならない

translation.en: I hate pirates. Hate them!
That's because you don't know me yet.
translation.ja: おれを知らないからさ

translation.en: This guy really likes himself.
translation.ja: 相当 自分が好きなんだな

translation.en: [Nami] I'm going to find the map. Pretend you're not here.
translation.ja: 海図を探すから存在を消してて

translation.en: But I am here.
[Nami scoffs] Why do you want the map so badly anyway?
I'm gonna use it to find the One Piece and become King of the Pirates.
translation.ja: 大秘宝(ワンピース)を見つけ海賊王になるためさ

translation.en: -[scoffs] Figures. -What?
Every idiot dreams of finding the One Piece.
translation.ja: バカはみんな見つけたがる

translation.en: People like you believe in something and you don't even know what it is.
translation.ja: それが何かも分からず信じてる

translation.en: [Luffy] Well, yeah.
Don't you?
So why did you decide to become a thief?
I didn't decide. I needed to eat. You do what you have to, to survive.
translation.ja: 食べるために仕方なくよ 生き残らなきゃ

translation.en: You're right. Nothing more important than food.
translation.ja: だな 食べることは大事だ

translation.en: [Nami] Just find the map.
What's going on here?
[Marine] Pirates, sir, inside the base. We're under attack!
translation.ja: 海賊です基地に侵入しています

translation.en: What pirates?
A woman with orange hair, dressed like a Marine.
translation.ja: 海兵に変装したオレンジの髪の女です

translation.en: She was trying to steal a map to The Grand Line.
My keys! Sound the alarm.
Do you think they know we're here?
translation.ja: ここにいるのバレたかな

translation.en: No, I think they're after the other thief and idiot pirate trying to steal a map.
translation.ja: きっと別の泥棒と海賊が追われてるのよ

translation.en: What are the odds of that?
Kidding. [chuckles]
But you might want to work a little faster.
[Morgan] Open up!
By the authority of the 153rd Marines!
translation.ja: 海軍第153支部の権限で命じる

translation.en: You need to hurry.
-I can't rush this! -Please hurry!
I have an idea.
-That's your idea? -Yeah.
How did you do that?
Aren't you that drunk from the bar?
Glad I made an impression.
The imposter, the pirate hunter, and the prisoner.
translation.ja: ペテン師 海賊狩り 囚人

translation.en: Fancy that. The three of you working together.
translation.ja: なんと３人でグルとはな

translation.en: Yeah. We're a crew!
translation.ja: ああ おれたちは仲間だ

translation.en: -Nope, not a crew. -Not together.
No enemy has ever escaped my wrath.
translation.ja: おれを怒らせたら逃げられはしない

translation.en: I alone defeated the Black Cat Pirates.
translation.ja: クロネコ海賊団も倒した

translation.en: I alone captured Kuro of the Thousand Plans.
translation.ja: “百計のクロ”もおれが１人で捕らえた

translation.en: And I alone keep Shells Town safe from the scum of the East Blue.
translation.ja: おれがこのシェルズタウンを悪党どもから守ってる

translation.en: It's not only the axe. Every part of his body's a weapon.
translation.ja: 斧だけじゃねェ全身が武器だ

translation.en: I'll go high. You go low.
translation.ja: おれは上に行く　お前は下だ

translation.en: So that's where it goes.
translation.ja: なるほど そう来たか

translation.en: Gum Gum Whip!
translation.ja: ゴムゴムの… 鞭(ムチ)！

translation.en: -Gum Gum Whip? -[Luffy] Yeah!
translation.ja: ゴムゴムの鞭(ムチ)？ そうさ

translation.en: All the great fighters call out their finishing moves.
translation.ja: 強ェやつは技名を叫ぶんだ

translation.en: No, they don't.
Hate to break up this beautiful moment, but we need to get this safe out of here.
translation.ja: それよりこの金庫をどう運ぶ？

translation.en: Maybe if we find some rope or something.
translation.ja: ロープか何か見つけて…

translation.en: Or we can do that.
-Careful with that! -[Zoro] Whatever you say.
translation.ja: 乱暴にしないで 知るかよ

translation.en: Oh, wait. I don't work for you.
translation.ja: お前の子分じゃねェし

translation.en: I'm sensing a little bit of tension amongst the crew.
translation.ja: 空気悪ィぞ 仲間なのに

translation.en: -Not a crew! -Not a crew!
-I can't leave without my friend. -Can't wait. The Marines will be here.
translation.ja: 友達が来ない 急がないと海軍が…

translation.en: The Marines are here already. You're under arrest.
translation.ja: 海軍はもう来てる 捕まえたぞ

translation.en: What's wrong with his hair? [laughs]
Yeah, I might've done that.
[man] I won't let you make a joke of me.
I'm taking you in and handing you over to my father.
translation.ja: お前らをおやじに引き渡す

translation.en: I'll be the hero. I might even get a medal or something.
translation.ja: おれは英雄になるきっと勲章だって…

translation.en: -Koby? -[Koby] God, that hurt!
It also felt really good too.
No time to explain, but we gotta go. This whole island is trying to kill us.
translation.ja: さっさと行くぞ追手がワラワラ来ちまう

translation.en: I'm not coming with you.
You sure?
Before we met, every choice was made for me.
translation.ja: ルフィさんと会って決めました

translation.en: But now I'm gonna do what I want to do.
I'm gonna be a Marine.
I want to help people that can't help themselves.
translation.ja: 弱い人たちを守ります

translation.en: Next time we meet, we might be enemies.
But for now…
we're friends.
This is Garp.
Pirates, you say?
Raiding our base in Shells Town.
What did they take? Weapons? Gold?
translation.ja: 取られたのは武器か？金品か？

translation.en: Change of plan.
We're going to Shells Town.
Got a lead on Baroque Works?
translation.ja: Ｂ･Ｗ(バロックワークス)ですか？

translation.en: We've been chasing those shadows a long time. This is different.
translation.ja: 今回はやつらではない

translation.en: A map to the Grand Line has been stolen…
translation.ja: 偉大なる航路(グランドライン)への海図が盗まれた

translation.en: by a pirate in a straw hat.
[man] They were pirates, Captain, just like us.
translation.ja: 私たちと同じ海賊です　船長

translation.en: And they got the map.
[captain] And you didn't stop them.
translation.ja: みすみす盗ませたのか？

translation.en: I couldn't. I mean, there were three of them.
They must've been planning this for months.
translation.ja: 前から狙ってたに違いない

translation.en: Well, that's my map.
translation.ja: あれはおれ様の海図だ

translation.en: And I'm gonna get it back.
No matter who I have to kill.
This is my first pirate score.
translation.ja: 海賊としての第一歩だ

translation.en: From now on, it's all gonna be smooth sailing.
translation.ja: 今シーズンは… ここからは順風満帆だ

translation.en: [Luffy] This crew can handle anything.
We've been making enemies everywhere we go.
Nothing can stop me from taking the East Blue.
translation.ja: 東の海(イーストブルー)の支配を止めるものはない

translation.en: We've been captured. We need a plan.
That went pretty well.
[Nami] Arlong will kill the entire village!
translation.ja: 村が全滅されられちゃう

translation.en: -Nami made her choice. -[Luffy] Ah!
[Luffy] We've got each other's backs… always.
translation.ja: おれの仲間は絶対に裏切らねェ

translation.en: [Garp] So these are the Straw Hat Pirates.
translation.ja: これが麦わらの一味か
